price: Wͻn nso a wͻsͻ Nwoma no mu (pintinn) na wͻfrε Nyame wͻ ne brε mu no, nokorε sε Yεmma apapafoͻ no akatua nyε kwa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yumassikūna bil-kitābi wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata innā lā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muṣ'liḥīna
